issue.title: [JS] JavaScript builds broken on master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1953](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1953). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/322059486

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1953?focusedCommentId=16305542) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
[~paul.e.taylor] could you take a look? Thanks!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1953?focusedCommentId=16305731) by Paul Taylor (paul.e.taylor):*
oh yeah, last week our build tool committed a silent breaking change w/o respecting semver. will PR a fix shortly

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1953?focusedCommentId=16306492) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1453
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1453>
